briefTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DF277 Compared to Placebo in the Treatment of Otic Eczema
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Parallel, Double-blind, Clinical Trial Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DF277 Compared to Placebo in Patients With Otic Eczema
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of DF277 for the treatment of otic eczema.

primaryOutcome.measure: Analysis of the Itching Change at the End of Treatment.
